version_description: Thanks for using Achievement! We launched some new, sleek brand refinements to make navigating our app easier. We'll continue adding even more Offers for Achievers to take healthy actions and earn more rewards (points!).

Thanks for using Achievement! To make our app better, we recently launched a fresh new look and feel. We're also introducing Offers, a destination for Achievers to take healthy actions and earn more rewards (points!).

Thanks for using Achievement! We recently launched point donation to a charity. You’ll now be able to donate your points to a health charity of your choice when you reach 10,000 points.

Our latest release makes it even EASIER to earn points and make money while tracking steps and other healthy activities that you’re probably already doing! Key features and in this release include:

• Bug fixes

• More

What’s New:
Our latest release makes it even EASIER to earn points and make money while tracking steps and other healthy activities that you’re probably already doing! Key features in this release include:

• Bug fixes and performance improvement

Thanks for using Achievement!

In this release we've added support for new kinds of surveys, better push notifications, and better offers experiences.
Bug fixes related to photo uploading.
Fixes for iPhone XS screen sizes.
Bug fixes, improvements, and HealthKit fun.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Achievement has been reimagined with a new look and feel!
Fixes for Health Kit authorization.

1. You can now change your email address.
2. A better password-changing experience.
3. Quality improvements.

1. One-click offers now reflect points and expiry dates appropriately.
2. Improved deep-linking support.
3. Other quality improvements.

1. Improvements to edit-personal-details screen. Your address is now optional.
2. Quality and stability improvements.

• Improved HealthKit data collection.
• Quality improvements.
• We have improved the process of redeeming your points for rewards!
• Improved HealthKit integration.

• Support for iOS 13 beta
• Other quality improvements

• Improvements when redeeming points for rewards.
• Sponsored offers are now labeled appropriately.
• Other quality improvements.

• Ensure Achievement renders correctly in dark-mode.
• Changes for the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
• Bug fixes and quality improvements.
• Fix a problem where HealthKit data was not syncing correctly for some users.
Improved notification handling.
• Fix an issue where Achievement fails to exit a survey properly, leaving the app in a "loading" state that never completes.

• Added option to share your Resting Heart Rate.
• Improved support for CCPA requests in-app.
• Various UX improvements and bug fixes.
• User-interface refinements.
You may now optionally share location data with Achievement so it can surface more relevant offers and content for you.
This release fixes a bug which prevented some users from receiving notifications.
User interface and stability improvements based on your feedback. Thank you!
We’ve made it easier for you to find activities you’ve shared with Achievement!
